scripts.tsx: time bash -c "for i in {1..$COUNT}; do ./node_modules/.bin/tsx index.ts; done"
scripts.node: time bash -c "for i in {1..$COUNT}; do node index.js; done"
scripts.node-tsc: time bash -c "tsc --outFile build/index.js index.ts && for i in {1..$COUNT}; do node build/index.js; done"
scripts.bun-ts: time bash -c "for i in {1..$COUNT}; do bun index.ts; done"
scripts.bun-js: time bash -c "for i in {1..$COUNT}; do bun index.js; done"
scripts.all: mkdir -p out && rm -f "out/results-$COUNT.txt" && (date >&2; bun tsx; bun node; bun node-tsc; bun bun-ts; bun bun-js) 2>> "out/results-$COUNT.txt"
